title: Heroic Orchestral Collection
description: A collection of 11 cinematic orchestral tracks with a heroic and proud feeling. This music is full and lush, with beautiful harmonies and melodies played by a large orchestral forces of strings, winds, brass, and percussion.
longDescription:
Preview: youtu.be/Aglcj5RrkNM
Soundcloud: soundcloud.com/sound-phenomenon/sets/heroic-orchestral-music

A collection of 11 cinematic orchestral tracks with a heroic and proud feeling. This music is full and lush, with beautiful harmonies and melodies played by a large orchestral forces of strings, winds, brass, and percussion. This music is ideal for dramatic, adventure, games that need a regal and epic feel.

11 tracks plus additional variations included:
1. Before the Battle (2 versions)
2. Calm Power (2 versions)
3. Dark Epic
4. Desert Adventure
5. Fearless (2 versions)
6. Heroic Fantasy
7. Heroic Journey
8. Heroic Trailer
9. Proud Brass (3 versions)
10. Strings Of Loss
11. Trials

Other Tracks by Sound Phenomenon:
audiojungle.net/user/Tyler_River/portfolio?ref=Tyler_River
pond5.com/artist/SoundPhenomenon
soundphenomenonstudios.com
